mvt_conc <- read_mytable("PRB_findings.xlsx", "traffic_IFR", "Table_Findings_traffic_IFR") %>% 
  filter(Year_Report == year_report, State == 'SES') %>% 
  select(Conclusion) %>% toString() %>% paste0(., "@")
